userDescription: Data is coming from Keyword API Data http://localhost:5000/keywords/api-data

1. Organic Traffic ETV (Estimated Traffic Value)

Meaning
Organic Traffic ETV represents the monetary value of a website’s organic search traffic, expressed as an estimated monthly cost if the same traffic were acquired via paid search (Google Ads).

Best practice UI labels

Organic Traffic ETV → “Estimated monthly value of organic traffic (USD)”
Organic Keywords → “Number of keywords ranking in Google Top 100”

Client explanation
“Your traffic is coming from keywords people search when they are ready to buy, not just learn.”
when the serp result generates top 10 pages as per keywords then we also find from them our true competitor by alssify them using AI
